description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国（北韩）与大韩民国（南韩）之间依据1953年《朝鲜停战协定》划设的军事分界线，是双方实际上的陆上边界。
description.en: The military demarcation line between the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (North Korea) and the Republic of Korea (South Korea), established by the Korean Armistice Agreement in 1953, serving as the de facto land border between the two countries.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜人民军、中国人民志愿军与联合国军于1953年签署的协定，旨在停止朝鲜战争的敌对行动。
description.en: An agreement signed in 1953 by the Korean People's Army, the Chinese People's Volunteers, and the United Nations Command to cease hostilities of the Korean War.

nodes.id: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚朝鲜半岛北部的社会主义国家。
description.en: A socialist state in the northern part of the Korean Peninsula in East Asia.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚朝鲜半岛南部的民主共和国。
description.en: A democratic republic in the southern part of the Korean Peninsula in East Asia.

description.zh-cn: 1950年至1953年间在朝鲜半岛爆发的一场战争，最终导致了朝韩军事分界线的确立。
description.en: A war fought on the Korean Peninsula from 1950 to 1953, which resulted in the establishment of the Military Demarcation Line.

description.zh-cn: 北美洲的联邦共和国。二战后与苏联共同托管朝鲜半岛，并支持大韩民国的成立。
description.en: A federal republic in North America. After World War II, it jointly administered the Korean Peninsula with the Soviet Union and supported the establishment of the Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 欧亚大陆北部的社会主义国家。二战后与美国共同托管朝鲜半岛，并支持朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的成立。
description.en: A socialist state in northern Eurasia. After World War II, it jointly administered the Korean Peninsula with the United States and supported the establishment of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 地球上的一条纬线，在1945年被用作朝鲜半岛南北的受降分界线，也是“三八线”名称的由来。
description.en: A circle of latitude on the Earth, used in 1945 as the demarcation line for accepting surrender in the north and south of the Korean Peninsula, and the origin of the name '38th parallel'.

description.zh-cn: 美国官员，二战后在地图上选择以北纬38度线作为朝鲜半岛的美苏受降分界线。
description.en: An American official who, after World War II, selected the 38th parallel north on a map as the line for American and Soviet acceptance of surrender on the Korean Peninsula.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的创建者和首任最高领导人。
description.en: The founder and first supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国首任总统。
description.en: The first President of the Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国第16任总统，首位徒步走过朝韩军事分界线的韩国国家元首。
description.en: The 16th President of the Republic of Korea, and the first South Korean head of state to walk across the Military Demarcation Line.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国第三代最高领导人，首位徒步走过朝韩军事分界线的朝鲜最高领导人。
description.en: The third supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, and the first North Korean supreme leader to walk across the Military Demarcation Line.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国第19任总统。
description.en: The 19th President of the Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 美国第45任总统，首位在任期间踏上朝鲜领土的美国总统。
description.en: The 45th President of the United States, and the first sitting U.S. president to set foot in North Korean territory.

description.zh-cn: 联合国军在黄海划定的朝韩海上军事分界线，但未获朝鲜承认。
description.en: A maritime military demarcation line in the Yellow Sea drawn by the United Nations Command, which is not recognized by North Korea.

description.zh-cn: 在朝鲜战争期间及之后，由美国领导的多国部队。
description.en: The multinational military force led by the United States during and after the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在朝鲜战争中派遣的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces dispatched by the People's Republic of China during the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 根据1953年《朝鲜停战协定》，划设了朝韩军事分界线。
description.en: The Military Demarcation Line was established according to the 1953 Korean Armistice Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 《朝鲜停战协定》的签署标志着朝鲜战争中主要战斗的停止。
description.en: The signing of the Korean Armistice Agreement marked the cessation of major combat in the Korean War.

relationships.source: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

description.zh-cn: 自1948年朝鲜半岛分裂以来，两国一直处于敌对和军事对峙状态，并于1950年爆发了朝鲜战争。
description.en: Since the division of the Korean Peninsula in 1948, the two countries have been in a state of hostility and military confrontation, which led to the outbreak of the Korean War in 1950.

description.zh-cn: 1945年8月，美国向苏联提议以北纬38度线作为双方在朝鲜半岛的受降分界线。
description.en: In August 1945, the United States proposed to the Soviet Union to use the 38th parallel north as the demarcation line for accepting surrender on the Korean Peninsula.

description.zh-cn: 1945年8月，苏联接受了美国以北纬38度线作为双方在朝鲜半岛的受降分界线的提议。
description.en: In August 1945, the Soviet Union accepted the United States' proposal to use the 38th parallel north as the demarcation line for accepting surrender on the Korean Peninsula.

description.zh-cn: 作为美国军官，迪安·里斯克在地图上选定了北纬38度线作为美苏受降分界线。
description.en: As a U.S. military officer, Dean Rusk selected the 38th parallel north on a map as the surrender demarcation line for the U.S. and the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 朝韩军事分界线因其大致沿北纬38度线划定而俗称“三八线”，尽管实际界线是根据1953年的停战控制线确定的。
description.en: The Military Demarcation Line is commonly known as the '38th parallel' because it roughly follows the 38th parallel north, although the actual line is based on the 1953 armistice control line.

relationships.target: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

description.zh-cn: 金日成在苏联的支持下于1948年建立了朝鲜民主主义人民共和国。
description.en: With the support of the Soviet Union, Kim Il-sung established the Democratic People's Republic of Korea in 1948.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国于1948年在美国占领军的支持下建立。
description.en: The Republic of Korea was established in 1948 with the support of the U.S. occupation forces.

relationships.target: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

description.zh-cn: 金日成是朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的创建者和首任内阁首相。
description.en: Kim Il-sung was the founder and first Premier of the Cabinet of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 李承晚通过选举成为大韩民国首任总统。
description.en: Syngman Rhee was elected as the first President of the Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 联合国军于1953年在黄海划定了北方界线作为事实上的海上军事分界线。
description.en: The United Nations Command established the Northern Limit Line in the Yellow Sea in 1953 as the de facto maritime military demarcation line.

relationships.source: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

description.zh-cn: 由于《朝鲜停战协定》中未提及，北方界线不被朝鲜方面承认。
description.en: Because it was not mentioned in the Korean Armistice Agreement, the Northern Limit Line is not recognized by North Korea.

description.zh-cn: 2007年10月2日，时任韩国总统卢武铉徒步走过军事分界线访问朝鲜，是首位这样做的韩国国家元首。
description.en: On October 2, 2007, then-South Korean President Roh Moo-hyun walked across the Military Demarcation Line to visit North Korea, being the first South Korean head of state to do so.

description.zh-cn: 2018年4月27日，金正恩在板门店跨过军事分界线与韩国总统文在寅举行会晤。
description.en: On April 27, 2018, Kim Jong Un crossed the Military Demarcation Line at Panmunjom to meet with South Korean President Moon Jae-in.

description.zh-cn: 金正恩是首位徒步走过军事分界线的朝鲜最高领导人。
description.en: Kim Jong Un was the first supreme leader of North Korea to walk across the Military Demarcation Line.

description.zh-cn: 2019年6月30日，美国总统特朗普在板门店与金正恩会面，并短暂跨越军事分界线进入朝鲜境内。
description.en: On June 30, 2019, U.S. President Donald Trump met with Kim Jong Un at Panmunjom and briefly crossed the Military Demarcation Line into North Korean territory.

description.zh-cn: 特朗普在板门店徒步越过朝韩军事分界线，成为首位在任期间踏上朝鲜领土的美国总统。
description.en: Donald Trump walked across the Military Demarcation Line at Panmunjom, becoming the first sitting U.S. president to set foot in North Korean territory.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民志愿军代表团曾是朝鲜军事停战委员会的成员，负责监督停战协定的执行，直至1994年奉调回国。
description.en: The Chinese People's Volunteer Army delegation was a member of the Military Armistice Commission, responsible for overseeing the implementation of the armistice agreement, until its recall in 1994.
